title: Reddit - The heart of the internet
text: Trojan in Windows\Installer folder? I posted this already in r/antivirus but I just want a second set of opinions. I ran a full system scan with Bitdefender a few minutes ago and I noticed it found an infected item in my Windows\Installer folder. The item path according to Bitdefender was: "C:\Windows\Installer\67f00e.msi=>(Embedded EXE)" The threat type was "Trojan.GenericKD.72086472" And the action it took to resolve this threat was "Cleaned". Bitdefender didn't seem to detect anything else. I also ran Hitman Pro afterwards and it came back fine with no detections. Does anyone know if I should I worry or if this is a false positive? What are the next steps I should take?
